articles.title: NHL player Colby Cave dies at 25
articles.description: Cave's wife, Emily, posted a heartbreaking image on her Instagram account, saying: "My heart is shattered."
articles.content:
Edmonton Oilers forward Colby Cave died Saturday after a brain bleed this week. He was 25.

articles.title: Coronavirus straining community health centers on front lines
articles.description: The spread of coronavirus is putting a strain on community health centers. A safety net stretched thin, where it is needed most. Adriana Diaz reports.

articles.author: Sophie Lewis
articles.title: Paul McCartney's handwritten "Hey Jude" lyrics sell for $910,000
articles.description: The lyric sheet was sold at an auction marking the 50th anniversary of the band's historic breakup.
articles.content:
On the 50th anniversary of The Beatles' breakup, the lyrics to one of the bands most popular songs, "Hey Jude," sold for $910,000 at a New York auction. It was the highest-selling item in the annual Beatlemania auction.
